title: Chapter 12: Voice Control with OpenAI Whisper
description: For humanoid robots to interact naturally and intuitively with humans, voice control is a crucial capability. OpenAI's Whisper is a state-of-the-art automatic speech recognition (ASR) model that can accurately transcribe human speech into text, making it an excellent foundation for building voice-controlled robotics systems.
